701325f-a.title: Bronx: Jarvis Avenue - Roberts Avenue
701325f-a.text:
Jarvis Avenue, east side, south of Roberts Avenue (vantage
point). The view is southeastward across the clearance on the
east side of Jarvis Avenue and shows the rears of houses (left)
that front on Mahan Avenue and extend to Middletown Road. In
the center background are the rears of three dwellings that front
on the north side of Middletown Road.
May 1W, 1938
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
